Name: This is a Ghost
About the game: This is a Ghost is a surnatural investigation game. You are a member of a secret society that hunts or sets free scary entities from our world. Start your investigation with a set of 14 tools to find clues to a haunting. 45 possibilities ! 15 entities with unique characteristics and 3 associated behaviours. Will you succeed in your contract ? Four maps to start the adventure: Small, medium and large. Find out more about the entity by conducting your survey and complete your contract. Destroy the threat or release the haunting from this world. Increase your reputation among secret societies and unlock new contracts, improves equipment. In progress Adding new maps Adding new equipment Support for the controller Translation into many languages I am developing this horrific investigation game on my own. I thank you for your participation in the community.
